Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $36.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:23:48 UTC – Details)

Product Description

The Original Rollerblade Style Office Chair Wheels, Safe for All Floors.

1 Safe for All Floors 2 Hardwood 3 Carpet 4 Laminate / Vinyl / Tile

Universal Size – Fits 98% of All Office Chairs

These chair casters are the universal size and fit 98% of all office chairs on the market. If they don’t fit your specific chair, no problem, we’ll take care of you.

Quick & Easy Installation

No tools required at all! Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop in the new ones. Replacing your chair wheels is easy and takes less than 30 seconds.

Our Lifetime Promise to You

Our lifetime promise has no expiration. So if you EVER have any issues with your new chair casters, we’ll send you a brand new set.

The ORIGINAL Rollerblade Style Chair Wheels!

We were the first to introduce rollerblade style wheels for office chair, way back in 2016. Designed in the USA, we continue to evolve and improve these office chair wheels.

The Office Oasis Featured on PBS Show ‘StartUP’

The co-founders of The Office Oasis, Meredith and Kevin, were featured on the PBS show StartUp. They shared their story on how they started a growing e-commerce business with just one simple idea.

★ LIFETIME WARRANTY – Our warranty never expires, so if you EVER have any issues, we’ll send you a brand new set of wheels. There are many cheaper knock offs available, but we’re the only brand that offers and stands behind a full lifetime warranty.
★ SAFE FOR ALL FLOORS – Many chair wheels use cheap, low quality materials that destroy your flooring. We don’t. Encased with soft, polyurethane material our rollerblade style wheels are guaranteed not to scratch or leave marks on any surface (including hardwood, carpet, tile, laminate and more).
★ QUICK AND EASY INSTALLATION – No tools required! Easily remove and replace the wheels in your desk chair in less than 30 seconds. Simply pull out your old caster wheels and pop these in. Check out our quick replacement video for more details.
★ UNIVERSAL SIZE – Upgrade any rolling office chair with these smooth caster wheels. The universal size stem will fit almost every office chair on the market. If for some reason they don’t fit your specific chair, we’ll give you a full refund and even pay the return shipping.
★ SUPPORTS UP TO 650 LBS – Manufactured with the best available materials these casters are built to last a lifetime. Heat treated high-grade steel, precision ball bearings, and durable polyurethane provide years of effortless rolling. The heavy duty chair wheels easily support 650 lbs.

The Office Oasis

Functional, Modern Office Essentials That Look & Feel Good

Previous page

  2. Message from the Brand Owners

    “We want you to be absolutely thrilled with your purchase. So if you ever need anything, just let us know!”

    -Meredith & Kevin

    Our Mission – To create functional office essentials that look & feel good. Because you deserve to work in a space that you love.

    Our Promise – We’ll do everything possible to make sure you are absolutely thrilled with your purchase. No matter what, we are here for you.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $69.99 - $36.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:03:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

How did we get our start?

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Today, we are a company that has more than 200 staff and owns over 6 departments with its products popularly sold in 10 different countries. By 2022, our sales volume has reached 5,000,000. This is where we get our start.

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Tomxcute product accessories

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.46 x 8.46 x 3.94 inches; 1.83 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0004-F
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ tomxcute
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09DSVFNRW

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $21.99 - $16.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:24 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Drink happier and healthier

How did we get our start?

WOPET was founded in 2015 in CA,USA,JP,EU at the same time, our version that brings joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.

Why do we love what we do?

WOPET team all love pets and technology and truly believe that every pet deserves a long and healthy life full of happiness and love.

What makes our products unique?

We are determined to create a boundless high-quality life for people with love and technology, and aimed at provide care for the value of life, and let pet owners get rid of the constraints of time and space.

W300 Cat Water Fountain

W500 pet fountain

Cat Water Fountain

Accessories for W300 and W300B

Automatic Pet Feeder

Boundless Love for Pets

WOPET vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world!

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.33 x 6.65 x 4.96 inches; 1.34 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ W300
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ WOPET
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4NHRR6H
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.


At WOpet, we all love pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.




WOPET was founded in 2015 in USA,CA,JP,EU. Wopet will use its innovative scientific and technological capabilities and persistent sense of social responsibility to provide a more complete boundless pet loving experience for pet families around the world.

  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Silent Running
  • User Manual*1
  • Brush*1
  • Filter*1

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

  • Please clean the water fountain every 3-4 days;
  • Please clean pumps every 2-4 weeks;
  • Please replace the filter every 2 weeks;
  • Please fill in water in time when the water level reaches Min.

Read more




Emergency Water Storage

With a water storage capacity of about 80ml, the water tray can still provide water for your pets when power outage occurs.

Visible Water Level

Check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Two Drinking modes

Flower waterfall or gentle fountain let your pets to choose!

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

Product Model W300 W300 W500 F10 For W500&W300 For W500&W300
Material ABS ABS ABS Stainless Steel

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

The FRAM Fresh Breeze cabin air filter is the only cabin air filter that uses the natural deodorizing properties of ARM & HAMMER baking soda and activated carbon embedded in the filter. FRAM recommends changing your cabin air filter every 12,000 miles.
VEHICLE APPLICATIONS: HONDA ACCORD; 2006-2015 HONDA CIVIC; 2012-2015 HONDA CROSSTOUR; 2007-2016 HONDA CR-V; 2005-2017 HONDA ODYSSEY; 2019-2022 HONDA PASSPORT; 2009-2022 HONDA PILOT; 2006-2014,2017-2022 HONDA RIDGELINE
VEHICLE APPICATIONS CONT: 2007-2011 ACURA CSX; 2013-2022 ACURA ILX; 2007-2020 ACURA MDX; 2007-2018 ACURA RDX; 2005-2012 ACURA RL; 2014-2020 ACURA RLX; 2004-2014 ACURA TL; 2015-2020 ACURA TLX; 2004-2014 ACURA TSX; 2010-2013 ACURA ZDX; 2003-2022
FILTER CROSS REFERENCES: BOSCH P3875WS; Honda (80219-SHJ-A01, 80292-SDA-407, 80292-SDA-A01); K&N VF2001; Purolator C35519
EASY INSTALL: This cabin air filter is located behind the glove box and on average will only take 15 minutes to replace the old filter with a new filter
FRAM Fresh Breeze cabin air filters are the only cabin filter built with Arm & Hammer baking soda combined with carbon embedded in the filter helping to take out and odors that enter your vehicle through the ventilation system

We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs. CW002 Pet Water Fountain ... Read more

Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.67 x 8.58 x 5.59 inches; 2.71 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Submarine
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ H&H
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more


Cat Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Model CW002 CW003 CW004
Capacity 1.8L/61oz 3.4L/115oz 2.4L/81oz
Flow Mode 2 3 3
Filter Model PAWF002 PAWF001 PAWF001
Replacement Filters B0B2P3Z5K2 B0B2JYRZCD B0B2JYRZCD

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.

From the brand

GARTOL Gardening Tools

Not sure how to get your GARTOL product to work correctly?

Contact our friendly support team for quick solutions.

The GARTOL is a 20 years old and professional brand in the United States. Our products are famous for high quality. We are specialized in manufacturing a wide range of garden tools comprising lopper, hedge shears, grass shears, hand pruners, hand saw, cultivator, rake, flower stand, and so on. All the products are sold to many countries and areas, including Europe, the USA, Australia, and East-south Asia.

Please let us know if you are interested.

GARTOL Miter Shears

GARTOL Garden Lopper

Garden Hose Holder

Garden Tool

Pump Sprayer,Plant Caddy

Ladies Sexy Stockings

Pump sprayer, Pruning shears

GARTOL Tools

ANTIRUST SK 5 STEEL BLADE Sharp sturdy blade, ideal for cutting chamfer, round molds, trunking and pvc strips, rubber gaskets, molding and weatherstrip.
HIGH-PRECISION ENGRAVING SCALE Clear and precise scale surface to help you cut accurately. Adjustable slider on the scale surface allows for a 45°-135°cutting angle, free to cut the trunking to different shape when needed.
ERGONOMICALLY DESIGNED HANDLE Strong and durable integrated handle is made of aluminum alloy and PPC anti-skid cover. Comfortable grip no hand fatigue for long-term use.
TURN CLASP SAFETY LOCK The turn clasp closure is easy to close and open, safe and convenient, you no need to worry about being accidentally scratched by the blade.
REPLACEABLE BLADE This trunking scissors set includes additional Spare Sharp heavy duty replaceable blade. Notice this shear is not suitable for cutting metal and stainless steel.

Have you ever had problems measuring your material only to realize it is slightly off and have to redo the entire thing?

If you’ve ever installed small moldings, such as quarter round, you’ll immediately recognize the utility of these miter shears.

GARTOL miter shears are perfect for all your installation needs to save you TIME. Use for cutting time trim, PVC piping, quarter round, tack strip, and other light materials.

Toggle to adjust the angle you want

The basic shear has a jaw with right and left 45° fences, and incised markings for 60°, 75°, 90°, 105°, 120°and 135°. Free to cut the trunking to a different shape when needed.

Don’t waste time measuring and cutting when you can do both at the same time with our Miter Cutters.

Read more

Multi-function angle shears great for cutting chamfer, shoe molding, trunking and wood parts for carpet.

Handy for odd trimming jobs, rubber plastic edge strip, PVC trunking corner, PVC edge strip, semi-circular strip, thin wooden splicing, and so on.

Snipping dowel and rods and all those other tasks too hard for scissors, yet too small for a saw. These multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.

Works effectively with softwoods up to 3/4″ in size.

Read more

The set includes additional spare sharp, heavy-duty replaceable blade

Our miter cutter has 2 Sk-5 steel blades, non-slip ergonomically designed handle, high-precision engraving scale, clasp safety lock.

  1. Premium stainless steel blade comes ready to take on any job, including cutting PVC, piping, wood trim, wires, or other similar materials without pulling out big materials.
  2. Whether you’re a handy person looking for a new tool or a professional with specific needs, these multi-angle cutters are great for small daily work activities or even DIY projects.
  3. Our tools come with a full steel frame and ergonomic rubber soles that provide great traction and comfort to help the hand when applying pressure on the cutter.
  4. Our pre-attached angled reference saves you a load of time and the hassle of measuring the angle trying to cut. Helps with accuracy and efficiency for your angle measuring needs

Read more

NOT SATISFIED?

If you are not completely happy please get in touch with us before leaving negative feedback. We can’t help you if you don’t let us know for assistance.

Please let us know via your Amazon order or our Amazon store. Enjoy GARTOL’s 1-year after-sales policy.

Thank you!

Exclusive tension spring arching technology creates a fit that’s custom-contoured to the curvature of each side of the windshield. Wiper blades are designed without brackets or hinges, offering improved design and performance over conventional wiper blades.
Easy Installation: This 22 Inch Wiper Blade Pair Is Easy To Install For A Quick Diy Wiper Blade Replacement. These Blades Conform Snugly Onto The Curves Of The Windshield For A Superior Fit. Instructions Included
Clean, Crisp And Clear: Experience An Ultra Clean And A Streak Free Windshield With Trico Windshield Wipers 22 Inch. These Automotive Replacement Wipers Can Withstand Rain, Wind, Snow, Mud, Dust, Or Any Other Debris That Might Hamper Your Windshield’S Visibility
Optimal Visibility: Sleek Aerodynamic Design Withstand Tough Winds And Decreases Wind Lift For The Utmost Visibility During Driving. Driver Windshield Wipers Also Reduce Snow Clogging For A Clear And Drier View
Close Contact Curvature: Receive The Closest Contact With Our Memory Curved Steel Beam Style. Intimate Contact Allows These Wiper Blades To Perform Effortlessly To Remove As Much Outside Extremities

Read more

TRICO Gold All-Weather Premium Beam Blades

TRICO Gold wiper blades are all-weather beam blades that are a step-up from the average, conventional wiper blade. They feature a beam blade design and come with our Swift Easy Connection Technology that allows for quick and easy installation. When shopping, make sure you have your specific vehicle selected before purchasing. These Twin Packs come with both driver side and passenger side wiper blades which ensures you are getting the correct fit each and every time.

Read more

Wiper Blade Features and Benefits

Reduced Wind-lift and Clogging

Low-profile, stylish design reduces clogging from ice during the winter months and reduces wind-lift for optimum visibility and performance while driving.

Better Fit for Modern Day Windshields

Beam blade design allows for the wiper blade to better conform to today’s curved windshields. The more coverage and contact the wiper blade can get with the windshield, the better the wiper blade will perform.

Tested Tough

Tested to last over 1,500,000 cycles.

Hassle-free Instillation

Quick and easy installation.
